snippet: Representative Joe Donnelly beat Richard E. Mourdock, the Republican who said in a debate that if a woman was raped and became pregnant, that was “something that God intended to happen.”
abstract: Rep Joe Donnelly of Indiana, three-term Democrat, defeats Republican Richard E Mourdock in race for state's open Senate seat; Mourdock was on defensive after his controversial comments on rape and abortion.
lead_paragraph: Representative Joe Donnelly beat Richard E. Mourdock, the Republican who said in a debate that if a woman was raped and became pregnant, that was “something that God intended to happen.”

headline.seo: Donnelly Wins Indiana Senate Race Over Mourdock
headline.main: Democrat Wins Race for Senate in Indiana
headline.print_headline: Democrat Wins Race For Senate In Indiana
